title: WhyFhy
author: WhyFhy
content: "The Twitter Files on free speech suppression soon to be published on Twitter itself. The public deserves to know what really happened …"       - Elons Tweet a few hours ago.What theory's yall got?political stuff?figment of his imagination?blackmail?

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I am guessing there will be lots about ‘verified account’ Trump supporters being silenced during the last election. I think a lot of banning on ‘free speech’ will be revealed. Probably loads of stuff about COVID also. I am really intrigued to see everything that is revealed. Some people are going to be very uncomfortable right now.
